pkgmetadata.longdescription: # python-cryptography-fernet-wrapper[Github Repository](https://github.com/KrazyKirby99999/python-cryptography-fernet-wrapper)# usage* Importing ```python pip install python-cryptography-fernet-wrapper ``` ```python from fernet_wrapper import Wrapper as fernet_wrapper ```* Encrypt ```python encrypted_data = fernet_wrapper.encrypt(data, key) ```* Decrypt ```python decrypted_data = fernet_wrapper.decrypt(encrypted_data, key) ```* Generate random key ```python key = fernet_wrapper.gen_key() ```* Generate key from password ```python key = fernet_wrapper.key_from_pass(password) ```
